DOC.brief_summary: VIBER aims at assessing angiographic outcome of drug-eluting balloon angioplasty assisted by the Vascular Imaging Balloon Catheter (VIBE, Volcano, San Diego, CA) device, which integrates a predilation catheter with electronic intravascular ultrasound capabilities.
DOC.criteria: Age >18 years De novo native vessel lesion RVD 2.5 4 mm Limited compliance with >3 month DAPT LMCA
